Room.Name: The Swift Hand
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Swift Hand Thieves' Guild in southwestern Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: This small building houses a small group of pickpockets who will gladly fence just about anything you might want to get off your hands quickly and without any questions. The Swift Hand is a low level guild and does not offer too many services to the advanced thief, but caters to the rogues of the land.
